title: Looking for a Top and Sub Diam+
body:
**Hey Guys, My name is Rudolph and I am the Manager for the Risen Academy,
were on  the hunt for a new Top lane and a Sub to fill the gaps of our current team.

This team will be working in  a competitive level so tournament experience will be in no short supply if you join us.

For the Top position we are looking for a tank minded toplane who has great TP awareness and can communicate well with the jungler.

for the Sub role we are looking for someone either flexible upon multiple positions or extrordinary in a few

Someone between high Plat to Challenger is our ideal candidate.

If you have prior experience in a competitive team that is also a bonus.

For those wishing to apply please include your IGN, Playable champions, rank and just a small snippet about yourself

We will be doing trials in the next few days so i hope to hear from you soon and good luck.



GGWP Rudolph

Risen Academy
Manager**

replies.body: Uh, Hey. I am currently Platinum 1, Jungle main. I'm looking to be your sub. I can play every role to a high plat standard (including support, which may be like mid plat) I primarily play champions like -- Irelia, Yi, Kayn, Kha'Zix, and Graves, I can play Irelia mid and Irelia top to a decent standard - 60% w/r with her. My IGN Is "Auryx", Feel free to add me if you'd like to further discuss.

interested, i am low elo i know. but my mechanics and knowledge of the game can make up for what elo i am currently in.
i can play top/jg and mid but top is my main role

I am a gold 5 player looking to fill the sub role on your team!
Though I am currently in a competitive team, we are inactive and I am looking to join a team with more momentum.
I am a support main and have been for 3 years, I also have confidence in the jungle.
My champ pool consists of:

Support: Morgana, Soraka, Lulu, Janna, Blitz, Rakan, Braum, and Nami.
Jungle: Graves, Jax, Jarvan IV, and Vi.

My IGN is FrostyLad

I have competitive experience already, as I have played in and have won two tournaments, one of which I played the final in the Sky Tower in Auckland.

I understand that I am not exactly the MM rank that you are looking for, but I have competitive experience and a fair and practiced champion pool which I think separates me from most gold players. I am also always willing to learn, and I strive to every day. I don’t tilt, but I love to have good banter with my teammates, this will never hinder mine or anyone else’s gameplay. 

Would love to hear from you!

Braden ‘FrostyLad’ Johnston
Support player for CNE
